trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for <xref:System.EventArgs> classes which support optionally raising exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Ger en basklass för <xref:System.EventArgs>klasser som stöd om du vill höja undantag.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The IntegrationExceptionEventArgs class enables the user to preview an exception before it is raised.
trans-unit.target: Klassen IntegrationExceptionEventArgs gör att användaren kan förhandsgranska ett undantag innan den aktiveras.

trans-unit.source: In your event handler, set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the exception should be raised.
trans-unit.target: I din händelsehanterare värdet för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>egenskapen `true` som anger att undantaget ska aktiveras.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to raise the <xref:System.Exception> specified by `exception`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Så här höjer du den <xref:System.Exception>anges av `exception`, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Exception>
Hämtar den <xref:System.Exception>som är associerade med den här <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs"> </xref>.</xref:System.Exception>
Den <xref:System.Exception>som är associerade med den här <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs"> </xref>.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to raise the <xref:System.Exception> specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om du vill öka det <xref:System.Exception>anges av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: In your event handler, set the value of the ThrowException property to `true` to indicate that the exception should be raised.
trans-unit.target: Ange värdet på egenskapen ThrowException till i din händelsehanterare `true` att indikera att undantaget ska aktiveras.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*> will be raised; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*>blir upphöjt, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
